per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.35*sin(1.14*time) + 0.16*sin(1.5*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.36*sin(1.27*time) + 0.15*sin(1.11*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.37*sin(1.284*time) + 0.15*sin(1.3*time);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=ob_r = wave_g;
per_frame_7=ob_b = wave_r;
per_frame_8=ob_g = wave_b;
per_frame_9=ib_r = wave_r;
per_frame_10=ib_b = wave_g;
per_frame_11=ib_g = wave_r;
per_pixel_1=hkdx=dx;//////////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_2=hkdy=dy;
per_pixel_3=hksx=sx;
per_pixel_4=hksy=sy;
per_pixel_5=hkrt=rot;
per_pixel_6=hkzm=zoom;
per_pixel_7=hkcx=cx;
per_pixel_8=hkcy=cy;
per_pixel_9=hkwp=warp;
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=dx=0;
per_pixel_12=dy=0;
per_pixel_13=sx=1;
per_pixel_14=sy=1;
per_pixel_15=rot=0;
per_pixel_16=zoom=1;
per_pixel_17=cx=.5;
per_pixel_18=cy=.5;
per_pixel_19=warp=0;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_20=
per_pixel_21=w=y*.95;
per_pixel_22=cc=w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*sin(ang*33)/2 +1;
per_pixel_23=zoom= cc-.01;
per_pixel_24=dx=dx/9+sin(time/11) /255;
per_pixel_25=dy=-0.0041;
per_pixel_26=rot=1;
per_pixel_27=///////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_28=cr1=90*.01;
per_pixel_29=cr2=91*.01;
per_pixel_30=crx=cr2-cr1;
per_pixel_31=ci=rad;
per_pixel_32=cb=.25  ;
per_pixel_33=crs=2;
per_pixel_34=cr=pow(sin(ci*6.3-(cb*6.3))/2+.5,crs)*crx+cr1;
per_pixel_35=cqr=if( above (ci,.25+cb),cr,crx+cr1);crr=if( below(ci,1.5),cqr,crx+cr1);
per_pixel_36=jx1=crr;
per_pixel_37=kx1=1-crr;
per_pixel_38=
per_pixel_39=hjdx=dx;
per_pixel_40=hjdy=dy;
per_pixel_41=hjsx=sx;
per_pixel_42=hjsy=sy;
per_pixel_43=hjrt=rot;
per_pixel_44=hjzm=zoom;
per_pixel_45=hjcx=cx;
per_pixel_46=hjcy=cy;
per_pixel_47=hjwp=warp;
per_pixel_48=
per_pixel_49=dx=(jx1*hjdx+kx1*hkdx);
per_pixel_50=dy=(jx1*hjdy+kx1*hkdy);
per_pixel_51=sx=(jx1*hjsx+kx1*hksx);
per_pixel_52=sy=(jx1*hjsy+kx1*hksy);
per_pixel_53=rot=(jx1*hjrt+kx1*hkrt);
per_pixel_54=zoom=(jx1*hjzm+kx1*hkzm);
per_pixel_55=cx=(jx1*hjcx+kx1*hkcx);
per_pixel_56=cy=(jx1*hjcy+kx1*hkcy);
per_pixel_57=warp=(jx1*hjwp+kx1*hkwp);////////////////////////////////////////////////////
